idea: KRR MONDIAL PRIVATE LIMITED is an established & trusted supplier of Steel Products to the Niche Market of Africa/Indian Ocean Islands/Caribbean  In these markets, we are supplying Steel Long Products & Flat Products from India/China/Turkey competitively. We supply the entire range of Steel Products and building material products to our Markets and bring the manufacturers/steel mills to the doorsteps of the small & medium buyers.
name: KRR MONDIAL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
A venture about educating and empowering leaders, investors & people into the field of economic and business data analysis and technology platforms.

We help passionate people to convert ideas into best-in-class business in investing in financial markets and in new-age digital technology applications.

In the financial services vertical, Avisa is dedicated towards educating people about the complete market and investment strategies for sustainable long-term wealth creation.

Avisa’s business will be managed by experienced and qualified professionals along with young passionate technology talent.

A self-made advisory firm offering Education & Advisory Services in the financial industry.

A holistic investment platform for all your investment needs.

The company aims at providing services only for the sole purpose of market completely understanding the market and its terms and also to help investors invest in the based on their own assessment and choice of individual investor.
name: Avisa Financial Advisory

idea: Gnosis Edutech is a platform where we will create online modules for developing skill-based education and management courses in the local languages of India starting with Hindi. These courses will be created and conducted by professionals in their respective fields. Our focus is to reach the Tier 2 cities and below where individuals are interested in upgrading themselves but don't have the platform to pursue these courses due to the exorbitant costs involved in the existing scenario. We will create a cost-effective offering to these markets.
name: Gnosis Edutech Private Limited

idea:
Tapefoods Agro is a start-up organisation by the women for the women. The company is supported by highly experienced professionals for WOMEN EMPOWERMENT.

Tapefoods is a DTH (Direct to Home) company who manufacture and distribute highly premium health-conscious products who not only improve your health but it also suits your taste buds which is always challenging to give HEALTH & TASTE both in each product mix.

On survey of healthy food package and found most of the health product not suits to your taste buds and very challenging to adopt in your daily life habits so we purchase abut never succeed in adopting due to our traditional lifestyle habits and But TAPFOODS has taken as challenging and after a long and deep research ,discussion with panel of doctor and nutritionists Tapefoods had found the best formula of the product which does not change your daily life style and perfectly suits to your taste buds Our all product mix is taking care of your HEALTH, LIFESTYLE AND TASTE.

Our Main objective is to give healthy ingredients like Ashwagandha, Gilroy, A2 Cow Ghee in your daily life style without disturbing you and your family taste buds.

The major and future concern is now a days is Children lifestyle who never accept those our Vedic ingredients in their lifestyle so TAPEFOODS had found the solution where CHILDREN will not come to know that they are eating all healthy ingredients without their awareness.
name: TAPEFOODS AGRO PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We as Start-up Entrepreneurs have built a platform to provide professional service to cater the investments objective of different investor classes. The Investment solutions provided by us cater to a niche segment of clients. The clients can be Individuals or Institutions entities with high net worth. In simple words, we shall provide professional management of investments to create wealth in form of algorithmic trading also known as algo-trading.

The trade can generate profits at a speed and frequency that is sometimes difficult for a human trader. Algorithms can enter buy or sell orders based on market information.
name: POTOFWEALTH NURTURING LLP
